title: OT76: Extropenism
summary:
Key ideas:
- Updates on meetups in San Diego and Irvine
- Vox requests a correction regarding their article on Silicon Valley and the Juicero incident
- Clarification on the controversial blog post "Polyamory is Not Polygyny"
- Mingyuan's writeup on SSC meetups and a list of upcoming meetups
- Announcement that serial novel "Unsong" is now complete
- Report Comments button is broken
- Cafe Chesscourt can now serve as an SSC forum.

Key learnings:
- SSC has an active community with regular meetups
- The author values accuracy and transparency in his writing
- Mingyuan is a helpful contributor to the SSC community

Key questions:
- None mentioned in this portion of the blog post.
